scriptLines:
query: '<fetch>
  <entity name='etl007_columnmap'>
    <attribute name='etl007_name' alias='a' />
    <link-entity name='etl007_column' to='etl007_targetcolumnid' from='etl007_columnid' alias='etl007_column' link-type='inner'>
      <link-entity name='etl007_columnmap' to='etl007_columnid' from='etl007_sourcecolumnidname' alias='src' link-type='inner'>
        <attribute name='etl007_name' alias='b' />
      </link-entity>
      <link-entity name='etl007_table' to='etl007_tableid' from='etl007_tableid' alias='etl007_table' link-type='inner'>
        <filter>
          <condition attribute='etl007_displayname' operator='eq' value='Individual' />
        </filter>
      </link-entity>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>') ~> etlreposrc
